basics.name: Sem van Embden
basics.label: Data Specialist
basics.summary: My friends and family describe me as an ambitious, hard-working and a person that is eager to learn. I always move the post and enjoy setting new goals, trying out new hobbies or learning new skills. I am someone with many interests, ranging from finance to physics. I enjoy working in teams, and at times leading them. In my spare time I enjoy playing racing games or practicing sports.

work.name: S-INDUSTRY
work.summary: Hired by, among others, Salesguide as an independent contractor to handle the gathering, processing, and analysis of data to assist in making strategic company decisions.

work.name: SALESGUIDE
work.summary: Developed and implemented a program for the automation of relevant and repetitive tasks to enhance the data gathering process of Salesguide. Worked with ELK-stack to process and handle large amounts of data.

volunteer.summary: Learned new skills and collaberated with team members to achieve target results. . Proved successful working within tight deadlines and fast-paced atmosphere. Helped design the current children’s room and section in the hospital.

Managed classrooms of up to 20 students in schools in Rotterdam and provided guest lessons at primary schools in both programming and Latin. Got children excited to tackle new problems, step out of their comfort zones and take on new challenges.

volunteer.position: Erasmus Science Project about Free Will
volunteer.summary: Researched and presented findings about the fact if free will exists by studying primate behaviour.
Followed Math Olympiad Training at Transtrend.

courses: Member of R.S.V. Sanctus Laurentius Student Association
Followed courses in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Pricing & Hedging of Derivatives (MSc)
Completed Gymnasium with the highest number of courses of the school.

certificates.name: HT1 Coach and Trainer Certificate (Field Hockey)
